translations: 矫饰的，故作多情的；过分俗丽的

sentences.sentence: The room was decorated with twee little pictures of animals.
sentences.translation: 这个房间里挂满了花哨的动物小图片。

sentences.sentence: His nest was in the apple tree, tweet, tweet, twee!
sentences.translation: 他的巢在苹果树上，啾，啾，啾！

sentences.sentence: Twee though it may be, the word is an apt description the entire Arsenal defence this season.
sentences.translation: 虽然有点夸张，但这个词确实恰当地形容了阿森纳整条防线本赛季的表现。
